thread.title: Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson ruled out of the England squad with Jurgen Klopp hopeful he will be back in two weeks
thread.title_full: Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson ruled out of the England squad with Jurgen Klopp hopeful he will be back in two weeks

author: mheathsmith
title: Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson ruled out of the England squad with Jurgen Klopp hopeful he will be back in two weeks
text:
EFL Jor still not fit Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson ruled out of the England squad with Jurgen Klopp hopeful he will be back in two weeks 
The Reds midfielder has missed the last three games with an ankle injury having suffered the setback in training last month By Phil Thomas 12th March 2017, 10:49 pm Updated: 13th March 2017, 12:36 am
